import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Handle callbacks from Google"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/auth/redirect"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Handles the Google OAuth redirect by exchanging the authorization code for an access token,
retrieving user information, and storing the session.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"code","in":"query","description":"Authorization code returned by Google","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"state","in":"query","description":"Custom redirect URL","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Login successful","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Login successful"}}}},"302":{"description":"Redirect to custom URL","headers":{"Location":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"description":"Custom redirect URL"}}},"400":{"description":"Missing authorization code","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Missing authorization code"}}}},"401":{"description":"Authorization failure during token exchange or user info retrieval","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Authorization failure"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
